message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for a very competitive price of $120. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll take advantage of it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be comfortable paying $90. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $110. This is a fair price considering the value the product can bring to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $110 is closer to what I'm looking for, I'm still only comfortable paying $95.  I truly believe this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great value for you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
